SEO.title: Doing Good Together Düsseldorf
SEO.someDescription: We are a local group that discusses how to best do good.
SEO.someSummary: In particular we focus on ideas of effective altruism, a social movement which applies evidence and reason to determining the most effective ways to improve the world
SEO.keywords: Effective Altruism, Effektiver Altruismus, Spenden, Düsseldorf, social impact, Doing good better, doing good together, 80.000, EA, rationality

Header.title: How can I make the biggest difference I can?

About.paragraph: We are a local group that discusses how to best do good. In particular we focus on ideas of effective altruism, a social movement which applies evidence and reason to determining the most effective ways to improve the world. We want to weigh causes and measures and then act in a way that makes the greatest positive impact using our individual talents and skills.

Activities.name: Meetups
Activities.text: Our regulars' table offers do-gooders the opportunity to exchange ideas in a cozy setting. Simply join our Meetup event and drop by. Prior knowledge is not necessary.

Activities.name: Talks
Activities.text: We organize talks on effective altruism and other social impact topics.

Activities.name: Social Meetings
Activities.text: We also get together for social gatherings like board game nights, climbing or other fun activities.

Introduction.title: It's important to help others
Introduction.text: When people are in need and we can help them, we think that we should.

Introduction.title: People are equal
Introduction.text: Everyone has an equal claim to being happy, healthy, fulfilled and free, whatever their circumstances.

Introduction.title: Helping more is better than helping less
Introduction.text: All else being equal, we should save more lives, help people live longer, and make more people happier.

Introduction.title: Our resources are limited
Introduction.text: Choosing to spend money or time on one option is an implicit choice not to spend it on other options.
